summary: The implementation covers most requirements comprehensively. All 13 requirements have been implemented in the backend (main.mo) and frontend components. The application includes proper authentication, CRUD operations for all sections, and follows the specified design constraints. Generated images are referenced correctly in components. Minor observations: some files were truncated in the diff, but visible evidence suggests complete implementation of all core functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile system with additional fields (branch, year, skills) stored separately from registration
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend implements a UserProfile type with fields (name, branch, year, skills) and profile management functions (getCallerUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile) that are separate from the registration system. The BuildRequest only specifies profile collection in the Join Us form (REQ-10), not a separate persistent user profile system.

The backend implements isPublic flags and publish functions (publishTeamMember, publishEvent, publishGalleryImage, publishProject, publishAnnouncement, publishAchievement, publishCollaboration, publishResource) for all content types. The BuildRequest does not specify a draft/publish workflow - it only mentions support adding, editing, and removing for various sections.
